room_title: Escape room "Motel Room 13" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: My husband and I do these escape rooms any date night that we get! We love them! Tonight we did Motel Room 13! We had a blast our game master was Lamont (at the Cold Spring location) and wanted to give him a shoutout for making it fun and making us feel comfortable as if we were playing with a friend! Highly recommend this place!
